ABOUT US

At Creekside Marketing, we combine analytical expertise with data-driven marketing to help businesses grow. Founded by longtime friends Cade and Peterson, our agency has been delivering results for over four years.

With a background in accounting and an MBA, Cade specializes in Facebook Ads, while Peterson, a mechanical engineer, focuses on Google Ads. Despite earning degrees in highly technical fields, we recognized the need for marketers with a deep understanding of numbers and data.

That expertise has made us the people other marketing professionals turn to when they don’t know what to do, and we bring that same level of strategy and precision to every client we work with.

Our approach is simple: strategic decision-making, continuous optimization, and custom solutions tailored to your business goals. Let’s grow your business together.

Our Services

RISK-FREE Strategy

When you book a consultation call, we're also giving you our $10K Profit Recovery Audit – the exact 247+ point checklist we personally use to find the “hidden leaks” draining 5–6 figures from ad accounts. Most advertisers are hemorrhaging money on 5–7 specific mistakes that take less than 20 minutes total to fix. This audit shows you exactly where to look and what to fix first.

(We typically charge $800 to do this type of audit. Yours is free just for showing up to the call. All you have to do is ask for it.)

We don't offer magical quick fixes, but long-term, strategic partnerships to position your business to make as much money as possible. While most freelancers optimize for leads, we focus strictly on the revenue we generate for your business, because at the end of the day, who cares how many leads you get if they aren't generating profit? We're who the experts come to when they are stuck and don't know what to do. We’ve cut cost per case in half for law firms, doubled client volume for dental practices, and scaled ecom brands to six-figure months.

The biggest risk you can take is not hopping on a call with us to explore how much more your campaigns could achieve.

Our in-depth knowledge of GA4, Meta Pixel, CAPI, CRM integrations, server-side tracking, CRO, and GTM are all crucial pieces of the puzzle when it comes to enhancing our campaigns' performance. Integrating these platforms into Facebook, Instagram, and Google is critical for success, and we can help you track every data point along your customer journey.

Our Services

Elevate your digital marketing with Creekside Marketing’s precision-driven strategies. With a deep focus on data, performance, and ROI, we help businesses cut through the noise, maximize ad spend, and connect with the right audience.

Google Ads (PPC)

We specialize in using Google Ads to drive targeted traffic and maximize ROI for businesses of all sizes. By analyzing key metrics, we optimize campaigns to ensure cost-effective ad spend while aligning with specific business goals. Whether it's increasing brand awareness, generating leads, or driving sales, we create customized strategies that improve ad performance.

Learn More

Facebook Ads (SMM)

We specialize in using Facebook Ads to drive targeted traffic and maximize ROI for businesses of all sizes. By harnessing audience insights and precise targeting capabilities, we develop tailored campaigns that align with specific business goals, whether it's boosting brand awareness, generating leads, or driving conversions. Our strategy focuses on optimizing ad creatives, placements, and budgets.

Learn More

White Label

Are you an agency that needs a white-label ad team? We offer full white-label PPC and Social Media Marketing services to make sure your clients are happy. We'll act on behalf of your agency, making the transition seamless from beginning to end, including deliverables, client communication, and ongoing optimizations.

We make
our process
easy

01 Consultation
During the consultation phase, Creekside Marketing takes the time to deeply understand your business goals, target audience, and unique challenges. Through in-depth discussions and analysis, we gather valuable insights to lay a solid foundation for your digital marketing success.
02 Customization
With the gathered information, Creekside Marketing crafts tailored strategies and solutions to meet your specific needs. We customize our services to align with your business objectives, ensuring that every aspect of our digital marketing approach is designed to maximize your online impact.
03 Strategy
We develop a comprehensive roadmap that outlines the key tactics and channels to achieve your digital goals. This involves careful planning and meticulous research to identify the most effective digital marketing strategies that will drive results for your business.
04 Implementation
Next we put the plan into action. We expertly execute campaigns across various platforms, leveraging our expertise in digital advertising, SEO optimization, social media management, and other relevant channels to ensure your message reaches the right audience at the right time.
05 Support
Creekside Marketing believes in building long-term partnerships, and our support extends beyond the initial implementation. We provide ongoing monitoring, analysis, and optimization to keep your digital presence ahead of the curve.
